sentences.en: Ahmed Omar Saeed Sheikh , Pearl's confessed kidnapper, was the front man in Nuss'1994 abduction, too.
sentences.cn: 自称是珀尔绑架案的主犯艾哈迈德·奥马尔·赛义德·谢赫正是1994年绑架努斯的那伙人的头目.

sentences.en: De Waal recognized him: His name was Musa Hilal, and he was the sheikh's son.
sentences.cn: 德瓦尔认得出他是谁: 他的名字就是穆萨希拉, 那位酋长的儿子.

sentences.en: Mahajabeen Sheikh gave birth to Rumaisa Rahman on September 19 2004 at Loyola University Medical Center.
sentences.cn: 马哈詹谢赫介绍了04年9月19日出生的鲁迈萨拉赫曼洛约拉大学医学中心.

sentences.en: Sheikh Abdullah Bin Zayed al - Nahayan made the comments during a visit to the West Bank.
sentences.cn: 阿联酋外长谢赫-阿卜杜拉-本 - 扎耶德-阿勒-纳哈扬是在访问约旦河西岸期间说这番话的.

sentences.en: Sheikh Ahmed is the younger brother of the president of the Unied Arab Emirates.
sentences.cn: 谢赫阿卜杜拉是阿联酋总统弟弟.

sentences.en: The Railways Minister Sheikh Rashid Ahmed said the deal was 80 % done.
sentences.cn: 铁道部长谢赫·拉希德·阿赫迈德称这个提议已获得80%成功.

sentences.en: The result is somewhere between Disney's Aladdin and Valentino's sheikh.
sentences.cn: 结果既有点像迪斯尼的《阿拉丁》,又有点像瓦伦蒂诺饰演的酋长.

sentences.en: The sheikh began to speak in a hoarse voice.
sentences.cn: 老人用沙哑的声音开口了.

sentences.en: Until the rains began to fail, the sheikh's people lived amicably with the settled farmers.
sentences.cn: 雨水仍然充足的时候, 酋长的牧民和定居的农人们一直和平共处.
